Title: Relates to enacting the "return on investment act"
Summary: Requires the state comptroller, and the NYC comptroller, to prepare an analysis of the return on investment of certain economic development programs and projects.
LawCode: Amd §8, St Fin L; add Art 2-K §25-ff, Gen City L; add §696-g, amd §970-f, Gen Muni L; amd §22-823, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, the general city law, the general municipal law, and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to an analysis of the return on investment for economic development programs
